hanzi-su-wiki:
豊

Значения

Богатый, обильный

Мнемоника

Сокращение. Богатые жертвы — злаки キ в чаше и бобы 豆.

Варианты

豐, 丰

heisig_story: Bend . . . table. Think of a bountiful harvest, and you will not be far from the meaning of this character.
koohiiStory1: The bountiful feast was so bountiful that it bent the table below it under its weight! いただきま〜す！.
koohiiStory2: Her bust and bum was so bountiful I couldn´t resist the urge to bend her over a nearby table and...
jp_example_words:
豊作(ほうさく): abundant harvest, bumper crop
豊富(ほうふ): abundance, wealth, plenty, bounty
豊か(ゆたか): abundant, wealthy, plentiful, rich
WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: Music beans make farts plentiful. And lucky for you, music beans themselves are also plentiful, so you can eat plenty of them to power your musical bean toots.
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: Imagine dancing to your own plentiful bean music as you gorge on beans.
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: Your music bean farts are too plentiful to leave your home (ほう). If you tried to leave your home you'd definitely fart all over people outside, so you keep your plentiful farts to yourself.
WaniKani_Reading_Info: Be polite! Keep your plentiful farts at home.
Ru_Radicals: 一 (один), ｜, 并, 口 (рот), 日 (день), 豆 (боб)
Kanshudo_mnemonic: beans (豆) with melodies (曲) are plentiful
origin_of_ch_char_book: (豊, 丰, feng, abundant) is composed of a ceremonial bowl (豆, dou, bean) and many pods of beans or ears of grain .
humanum_full_description_en:
Oracle from "玨" to "壴". "豊" is the first text of " li ". Lin Yuan believes that "玨" (jade) and "壴" (drums) were often used in ritual activities in ancient times, so they expressed the concept of ritual. "The Analects. "Yanghuo": "Liyun Liyun, the jade silk cloud is zai? Leyun and leyun, the bell and drum cloud is zai?"

Oracle is pronounced " Li ", which means sweet wine. For example, "Collection" 32536: "Used for the old wine." "Old wine" means "old wine", which means old wine.

Bronze inscription means ritual, referring to the rituals of the ancestral temple, such as the death of heaven: "The king has (have) Dafeng (li)." It is also pronounced "醴", which means liquor, such as Changzheng: "Muwangxiang (飨) Feng (醴)." Also used as a person's name.

The bamboo slips of the Warring States Period also express courtesy. Such as "Guodian Jane. "Zun Deyi" Jane 9-10: "Wu (you) Feng (li) wisdom (knowledge) happy, 挛 (you) happy wisdom (knowledge) 𢙇 (sorrow)." Another example is "Shangbo Zhushu I." "Confucius Poetry Theory" Jian 5: "Jing Zong [宀 Miao] (temple)'s Feng (ritual), 㠯 (to) is not (its) [benji] (ben)."

The lower part of the Xiaozhuan is mistakenly in the shape of " bean ". "Shuowen" mistakenly believes that the word "豊" is derived from " dou ", which is incorrect. In addition, " Feng " and " Feng " are mixed in the inscriptions of Han and Wei Dynasty. Lin Yuan believes that it is caused by similar fonts. Judging from the unearthed ancient Chinese characters, " Feng " and " Feng " are two different origins. word. See " Feng ".
humanum_short_description_en: Oracle from "玨" to "壴". "豊" is the first text of " li ". Lin Yuan believes that "玨" (jade) and "壴" (drums) were often used in ritual activities in ancient times, so they expressed the concept of ritual.
humanum_full_description:
甲骨文從「玨」從「壴」。「豊」是「禮」的初文，林澐認為古代進行禮儀活動時常用「玨」（玉）和「壴」（鼓），故以此表示禮的概念。《論語．陽貨》：「禮云禮云，玉帛云乎哉？樂云樂云，鍾鼓云乎哉？」

　　甲骨文讀作「醴」，表示甜酒。如《合集》32536：「叀（惠）舊豊用。」「舊豊」即「舊醴」，表示陳酒。

　　金文表示禮，指宗廟郊祀之禮，如天亡簋：「王又（有）大豊（禮）。」又讀為「醴」，表示醴酒，如長甶盉：「穆王鄉（饗）豊（醴）。」又用作人名。

　　戰國竹簡也表示禮。如《郭店簡．尊德義》簡9-10：「䌛（由）豊（禮）智（知）樂，䌛（由）樂智（知）𢙇（哀）。」又如《上博竹書一．孔子詩論》簡5：「敬宗[宀苗]（廟）之豊（禮），㠯（以）為丌（其）[本臼]（本）。」

　　小篆下部訛為「豆」形，《說文》誤以為「豊」字從「豆」，不確。又「豊」和「豐」在漢魏碑銘中有相混的情況，林澐認為是字形相近所致，從出土的先秦古文字資料來看，「豊」和「豐」是起源不同的兩個字。參見「豐」。
humanum_short_description: 甲骨文從「玨」從「壴」。「豊」是「禮」的初文，林澐認為古代進行禮儀活動時常用「玨」（玉）和「壴」（鼓），故以此表示禮的概念。

豊作(ほうさく): abundant harvest, bumper crop
豊富(ほうふ): abundance, wealth, plenty, bounty
豊か(ゆたか): abundant, wealthy, plentiful, rich

甲骨文從「 玨 」從「 壴 」。「 豊 」是「 禮 」的初文，林澐認為古代進行禮儀活動時常用「 玨 」（玉）和「 壴 」（鼓），故以此表示禮的概念。《論語．陽貨》：「禮云禮云，玉帛云乎哉？樂云樂云，鍾鼓云乎哉？」 甲骨文讀作「 醴 」，表示甜酒。如《合集》32536：「叀（惠）舊豊用。」「舊豊」即「舊醴」，表示陳酒。 金文表示禮，指宗廟郊祀之禮，如天亡簋：「王又（有）大豊（禮）。」又讀為「 醴 」，表示醴酒，如長甶盉：「穆王鄉（饗）豊（醴）。」又用作人名。 戰國竹簡也表示禮。如《郭店簡．尊德義》簡9-10：「䌛（由）豊（禮）智（知）樂，䌛（由）樂智（知）𢙇（哀）。」又如《上博竹書一．孔子詩論》簡5：「敬宗[宀苗]（廟）之豊（禮），㠯（以）為丌（其）[本臼]（本）。」 小篆下部訛為「 豆 」形，《說文》誤以為「 豊 」字從「 豆 」，不確。又「 豊 」和「 豐 」在漢魏碑銘中有相混的情況，林澐認為是字形相近所致，從出土的先秦古文字資料來看，「 豊 」和「 豐 」是起源不同的兩個字。參見「 豐 」。
Oracle from " 玨" to " 壴". " 豊" is the first text of " li". Lin Yuan believes that " 玨" (jade) and " 壴" (drums) were often used in ritual activities in ancient times, so they expressed the concept of ritual. "The Analects. "Yanghuo": "Liyun Liyun, the jade silk cloud is zai? Leyun and leyun, the bell and drum cloud is zai?" Oracle is pronounced " Li", which means sweet wine. For example, "Collection" 32536: "Used for the old wine." "Old wine" means "old wine", which means old wine. Bronze inscription means ritual, referring to the rituals of the ancestral temple, such as the death of heaven: "The king has (have) Dafeng (li)." It is also pronounced " 醴", which means liquor, such as Changzheng: "Muwangxiang (飨) Feng (醴)." Also used as a person's name. The bamboo slips of the Warring States Period also express courtesy. Such as "Guodian Jane. "Zun Deyi" Jane 9-10: "Wu (you) Feng (li) wisdom (knowledge) happy, 挛 (you) happy wisdom (knowledge) 𢙇 (sorrow)." Another example is "Shangbo Zhushu I." "Confucius Poetry Theory" Jian 5: "Jing Zong [宀 Miao] (temple)'s Feng (ritual), 㠯 (to) is not (its) [benji] (ben)." The lower part of the Xiaozhuan is mistakenly in the shape of " bean". "Shuowen" mistakenly believes that the word " 豊" is derived from " dou", which is incorrect. In addition, " Feng" and " Feng" are mixed in the inscriptions of Han and Wei Dynasty. Lin Yuan believes that it is caused by similar fonts. Judging from the unearthed ancient Chinese characters, " Feng" and " Feng" are two different origins. word. See " Feng".

lǐ
сущ.
1) * ли (ритуальный сосуд, род чаши)
2) * вм. 礼 (этикет; обряд, ритуал)
3) * вм. 丰 (богатый, пышный)
Radicals: 曲, 豆  (music, beans)
Meaning Mnemonic
Music beans make farts plentiful. And lucky for you, music beans themselves are also plentiful, so you can eat plenty of them to power your musical bean toots.
Imagine dancing to your own plentiful bean music as you gorge on beans.
Reading Mnemonic
Your music bean farts are too plentiful to leave your home (ほう). If you tried to leave your home you'd definitely fart all over people outside, so you keep your plentiful farts to yourself.
Be polite! Keep your plentiful farts at home.
